author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sandstorm Gold Q4 Revenue $15.4 Million Versus $16.5 Million
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Sandstorm Gold Ltd:
* SANDSTORM GOLD ANNOUNCES 2017 FOURTH QUARTER AND ANNUAL RESULTS
* Q4 REVENUE $15.4 MILLION VERSUS $16.5 MILLION * ‍ATTRIBUTABLE GOLD EQUIVALENT PRODUCTION FOR 2018 IS FORECAST TO BE BETWEEN 50,000 AND 60,000 OUNCES​
* ‍FORECASTING ATTRIBUTABLE GOLD EQUIVALENT PRODUCTION OF APPROXIMATELY 125,000 OUNCES PER ANNUM IN 2022​
* QTRLY ‍ATTRIBUTABLE GOLD EQUIVALENT OUNCES SOLD OF 12,032 OUNCES VERSUS 13,245 OUNCES IN Q4 2016 ​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
